MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the L34 postcode area of Prescot, affecting properties in Cyprus Street and the surrounding area. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10:30 am to complete repairs to a fault on the underground cable network. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3:00 pm. We will update this message if the situation changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:52 am on 18th March, 2021.
